title: Love Lessons
description:
One year ago, I saw her in my class.

One year ago, the ground opened up beneath me.

Avery Jennings. She’s my student. My secret longing. My kryptonite.After I taught her for one semester, I was clear: she needs to stay away. My restraint is wearing thin.But the first day of class in her second year, who do I find in my lecture hall?Avery is sweet. Determined. She looks at me with hearts in her eyes.And I’m a monster. A wicked man.Because with her… I can’t resist.
Love Lessons is a short and steamy instalove story, starring one possessive professor and his love-struck student.
author: Cassie Mint
